channel.title: Thoughts In Progress
channel.description: Recent content on Thoughts In Progress

item.title: Home
item.description: Hello! I’m Srujun Thanmay Gupta, a senior in Computer Engineering at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. I’m researching stream data processing systems with Prof. Indy and Shadi A. Noghabi. I’m starting this blog primarily to motivate me to write about more things like my research work, projects, thoughts, and experiments. My interests are in distributed systems, digital design, data analysis and visualization, finance, and sports. You can find my resume here and reach out through email.
